body:
### Welcome
You'll find all sorts of technical information on software development related to DNS, routing, devops and more here. Don't get too attached to any programming language either, we'll cover Java, Clojure, Node.js, Go, Python, Ruby, and probably quite a few more as time goes by.


### Lame DNS testing
Be sure to check out lame.cobenian.com

### Secure route origination
Be sure to check out www.cobenian.com/documentation/rpki.html and rpki.cobenian.com.

### Our home
And of course, don't forget about www.cobenian.com.
name: Cobenian Blog
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
